different colored markers here so that i can identify which side is the start of the round and which is the end of the round this helps immensely if you put your work down for any reason and need to come back to it you can easily identify if you re on the first half or the second half of the round when using the same color i find it easy to become confused and end up making errors that upset the overall increases and stitch count i usually use the lighter-colored marker at the first position thinking this is mid-day around the clock face and the darker marker at the close of the round thinking this is midnight around the clock face you can come up with whatever mnemonic works best for you but this is what makes sense to me  r3 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet and in each st
